summary: This document is a chain of emails from April 26, 2019, between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel discussing preparations for a meeting with Brad Weinsheimer. The emails focus on updating a memo regarding the Epstein case, specifically mentioning the need to address the Florida victims litigation and a CVRA suit, and requesting identification details for 'Victim-3'.

persons.name: Brad Weinsheimer
persons.context: Mentioned as the person with whom a meeting is scheduled on Monday; appears to be a Department of Justice official receiving updates on the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting with Brad Weinsheimer
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Monday (April 29, 2019) between USANYS personnel and Brad Weinsheimer to discuss updates on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The emails discuss preparing an update memo on the Epstein case for a meeting with DOJ official Brad Weinsheimer.
The memo needs to address the Florida victims litigation and a Crime Victims' Rights Act (CVRA) suit.
A specific request is made for a first name or last initial for 'Victim-3', indicating ongoing victim identification efforts.
The communication highlights internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the Epstein investigation in April 2019.
